parameters.description: State of bounes: HISTORIC, AVAILABLE, OPT_IN, ACTIVE, AVAILABLE_AND_OPT_IN

parameters.name: onlyOptInCampaigns
parameters.description:
false -  Include campaigns the punter has not yet opted-in or do not use voucher codes to opt-in (i.e Discount Bonus)
true -  Do not include campaigns the punter has not opted-in yet or do not use voucher codes to opt-in (i.e Discount Bonus)

get.summary: Get a tree of all categories
get.description: Retrieves a tree containing all the sport hierarchy. From top to bottom: Sport(e.g. Football), Category(e.g. England), Tournament(e.g. Premier League). Click here to see a sample response.. The client can filter the response using the provided query parameters.

parameters.description: The category type to include in the response. By default all types are returned.

parameters.description: Whether to ignore events without coupon codes. Default value true.

parameters.name: includeOnlyParlay
parameters.description: Whether to include only parlay events. Default value false.

eventCodes.description: Event codes separated by comma in case the terminal requests odds/results. If the specific attribute is not stated the fromEventCode & toEventCode attributes are mandatory.

fromEventCode.description: From event code that the terminal requests odds/results. If the specific attribute is stated the toEventCode attribute is mandatory and the eventCodes must not be stated.

fromSelectionCode.description:
From selection code that the terminal request odds. If the specific attribute is stated the attribute toSelectionCode is mandatory. In case that the fromSelectionCode & the toSelectionCode are not stated, then the returned selection codes must be:
 All the selection codes <= 10000 (special selection codes)
 From the selection codes >= 10001 (normal codes), those are included in the markets:
o Fulltime result
o Halftime/Fulltime result
o 1st Half result
o 1st Half result  Double chance (one odds)
o 2nd Half result
o 2nd Half result  Double change
o Team will score first
o Fulltime result  Double chance
o Sum of Goals in the match (0-1, 2-3 & 4+).

reportDate.description: Report date that the below event(s) are/were active (epoch).

sport.description: Requested sport that you need from the above event list to include in the report response.

toEventCode.description: To event code that terminal requests odds/results. If the specific attribute is stated the fromEventCode attribute is mandatory and the eventCodes must not be stated.

toSelectionCode.description:
To selection code that the terminal request odds. If the specific attribute is stated the attribute fromSelectionCode is mandatory.
In case that the fromSelectionCode & the toSelectionCode are not stated, then the returned selection codes must be:
 All the selection codes <= 10000 (special selection codes)
 From the selection codes > 10000 (normal codes), those are included in the markets:
o Fulltime result
o Halftime/Fulltime result
o 1st Half result
o 1st Half result  Double chance (one odds)
o 2nd Half result
o 2nd Half result  Double change
o Team will score first
o Fulltime result  Double chance
o Sum of Goals in the match (0-1, 2-3 & 4+)
